object.name: Capabilities.
object.description: This object contains parameters relating to the hardware capabilities of the HSS server.

parameter.name: IMSI
parameter.description: IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) is the subscribers permanent identity.

parameter.name: ImeiImeisv
parameter.description: International Mobile Equipment Identity - Software Version Number

parameter.name: MMEAddress
parameter.description: The IP address of the MME currently serving this MS.

parameter.name: MsPsPurgedFromEps
parameter.description: Indicates that the EMM and ESM contexts of the UE are deleted from the MME.

parameter.name: OdbParameters
parameter.description: Indicates that the status of the operator determined barring

parameter.name: UrrpMme
parameter.description: UE Reachability Request Parameter indicating that UE activity notification from MME has been requested by the HSS.

object.name: SubscriptionProfileList.{i}.
object.description: Each subscription profile contains one or more PDN subscription contexts

parameter.name: ContextIdentifier
parameter.description: Index of the PDN subscription context.

parameter.name: PdnType
parameter.description: Indicates the subscribed PDN Type (IPv4, IPv6, IPv4v6)

parameter.name: APN
parameter.description: Access Point Name. A label according to DNS naming conventions

parameter.name: EpsSubscribedQoSProfile
parameter.description: The bearer level QoS parameter values for that APN's default bearer

parameter.name: SubscribedApnAmbr
parameter.description: The maximum aggregated uplink and downlink MBRs

parameter.name: PdnGwidentity
parameter.description: The identity of the PDN GW used for this APN.
